declarations.name: STATUSLIGHT_VARIANTS
declarations.deprecated:
The `STATUSLIGHT_VARIANTS` export is deprecated and will be removed
in a future release. If needed, you can access the internal
`StatusLight.VARIANTS` property from the constructor.

slots.description: text label of the Status Light

members.name: variant
members.description: The variant of the status light.

members.name: disabled
members.deprecated:
The `disabled` property is is deprecated and will be removed
in a future release.

A status light in a disabled state shows that a status exists, but is not available in that circumstance. This can be used to maintain layout continuity and communicate that a status may become available later.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The variant of the status light.
